menu.menuTitle: What would you like to do next?
menu.studyPlanEmptytoastBody: Tell us the portion you wish to complete, and we will help you plan what to study and for how long, every day.
menu.newFeaturetoastBody: We have made some critical updates to STUDI. Some of these updates will come into effect only after you refresh this page.
menu.assign_gt_ten: You have more than 10 Assignments Pending

notes.deleteModalPrimaryLabel: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
notes.deleteModalSecondaryLabel: You will lose this note permanently
notes.discardModalPrimaryLabel: Are you sure you want to discard?
notes.discardModalSecondaryLabel: You will lose what you were working on.

assignment.assignTaskFormInstructionHelpLabel: Include clear instructions for the task
assignment.assignTaskFormAttachmentsHelpLabel: Add appropriate attachments to support the task
assignment.assignTaskFormCompletionHelpLabel: Select criteria for completion of task
assignment.assignTaskFormDurationHelpLabel: Define time required to complete this task
assignment.assignTaskFormDueByHelpLabel: Set a date for completing the task
assignment.assignTaskFormTitleHelpLabel: Add a title that is easy to scan
assignment.discardModalPrimaryLabel: Are you sure you want to discard?
assignment.discardModalSecondaryLabel: You will lose what you were working on.

chapters.lowConfTooltip: We are not so confident on this topic just yet. We require a lot more practise.
chapters.mediumConfTooltip: We are confident that we will do moderately well on this topic. Some more practise will help.
chapters.highConfTooltip: We are confident that we’ll do exceptionally well on this topic.
chapters.notAssessedConfTooltip: We have not completed a single practise or test on this topic yet.

mylessonredirect.heading: Paused Plan
mylessonredirect.info: You have paused this plan on {{planPauseDate}}. All your previous progress will be modified with a new end date.

planComplete.heading: Congratulations!
planComplete.info: We have successfully completed our plan.

deadlinemissed.heading: Deadline Passed
deadlinemissed.info: This plan has overshot its deadline. We need a new deadline to finish the rest of the portion.

schedule.ringText: Let's target to fill our study rings well before time today as well.

myplan.activeText: Your tasks are assigned as per this plan

planprogress.heading: You are almost there
planprogress.info: Let's target a daily study pace that will keep us above the planned rate of study, so that we'll be done with this portion well before time.
planprogress.planCompleteMessage: We have completed the portion for this plan. Let’s add a few more topics to continue studying from this plan.
planprogress.pauseAlertHeading: Are you sure you want to pause {{label}} ?
planprogress.pauseAlertInfo: You will be unable to access the lessons you were working on.

subjectcontainer.tooltipHeading: You have priorotized this subject for extra study.

menu.modifySettingFirstLine: You can now make changes to the Setting sections.
menu.modifySettingSecondLine: Please get in touch with us to make changes to locked

otp.validateTime: OTP will be valid for 60 seconds

syllabus.confirmModalInfo: You can change the selected syllabus once within your existing subscription.
